scripts.build: npm run build:rest && npm run build:stompjs && npm run build:avsc
scripts.clean: rimraf dist tests **/tsdoc-metadata.json src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.d.ts.map stompjs/**/*.d.ts stompjs/**/*.d.ts.map avsc/**/*.d.ts avsc/**/*.d.ts.map */*.metadata.json ./*.metadata.json ./*.d.ts ./*d.ts.map */dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run bundle && npm run version:placeholder && npm run version:git
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run version:placeholder && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:duplicates
scripts.doc: path-exists docs && npm run doc:generate || echo "No docs generated!"
scripts.doc:generate: npm run doc:generate:rest && npm run doc:generate:stompjs && npm run doc:generate:avsc
scripts.doc:save: cd docs && git add . && git commit -m "INT: updated API docs ng-rest" && git push && cd ..
scripts.doc:generate:rest: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-rest && npm run doc:json:rest && npm run doc:md:rest
scripts.doc:md:rest: api-documenter markdown -i temp -o docs/content/api/ng-rest && rimraf temp
scripts.doc:generate:stompjs: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-rest-stompjs && npm run doc:json:stompjs && npm run doc:md:stompjs
scripts.doc:md:stompjs: api-documenter markdown -i stompjs/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-rest-stompjs && rimraf stompjs/temp
scripts.doc:generate:avsc: rimraf docs/content/api/ng-rest-avsc && npm run doc:json:avsc && npm run doc:md:avsc
scripts.doc:md:avsc: api-documenter markdown -i avsc/temp -o docs/content/api/ng-rest-avsc && rimraf avsc/temp
